price: ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߣߴߏ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ߕߍߝߋ߲ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߣߌ߬ߣߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߋ߬ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߊ߬ߓߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-ʿazīzu al-ghafāru
